mapper.select: SELECT LD.LABEL_ID, LD.LABEL_TYPE, LD.LABEL_CONTENE, LD.LABEL_LOGIC, LD.LABEL_CONDITION FROM labeltag_detail LD JOIN labeltag_main LM ON ( LD.MAIN_ID = LM.ID) WHERE LM.SYS_USER = #{sysUser} AND LM.MAINLABEL_NAME = #{mainLabelName} ORDER BY LD.LABEL_ID ;
SELECT MAINLABEL_NAME FROM labeltag_main WHERE 1 = 1 AND SYS_USER = #{sysUser} AND TYPE = #{type} ORDER BY ID

SELECT IFNULL(USER_ID,'') AS USER_ID, IFNULL(CG_USER_ID,'') AS CG_USER_ID, IFNULL(OLD_USER_ID,'') AS OLD_USER_ID, IFNULL(PHONE,'') AS PHONE, IFNULL(USERNAME,'') AS USERNAME, IFNULL(REALNAME,'') AS REALNAME, IFNULL(REGISTER_TIME,'') AS REGISTER_TIME, IFNULL(FIRSTINVEST_TIME,'') AS FIRSTINVEST_TIME, IFNULL(CHANNEL_NAME,'') AS CHANNEL_NAME, IFNULL(SEX,'') AS SEX, IFNULL(AGE,'') AS AGE, IFNULL(IS_INTERFLOW,'') AS IS_INTERFLOW, IFNULL(IS_DEPOSITORY,'') AS IS_DEPOSITORY, IFNULL(INV_PERIOD,'') AS INV_PERIOD, IFNULL(INV_INTERVAL,'0') AS INV_INTERVAL, IFNULL(NORMAL_PERIOD_PREFERENCE,'0') AS NORMAL_PERIOD_PREFERENCE, IFNULL(CHANGE_PERIOD_PREFERENCE,'0') AS CHANGE_PERIOD_PREFERENCE, IFNULL(CUMULATIVE_INV_MONEY,'0') AS CUMULATIVE_INV_MONEY, IFNULL(CUMULATIVE_INV_MONEY_YEAR,'0') AS CUMULATIVE_INV_MONEY_YEAR, IFNULL(BALANCE,'0') AS BALANCE, IFNULL(LAST_INV_MONEY,'0') AS LAST_INV_MONEY, IFNULL(INV_MAX_MONEY,'0') AS INV_MAX_MONEY, CONCAT(IFNULL(USE_VOUCHER_PROPORTION,'0'),'%') AS USE_VOUCHER_PROPORTION, IFNULL(CUMULATIVE_USE_VOUCHER_MONEY,'0') AS CUMULATIVE_USE_VOUCHER_MONEY, IFNULL(CUMULATIVE_USE_VOUCHER_COU,'0') AS CUMULATIVE_USE_VOUCHER_COU, CONCAT(IFNULL(VOUCHER_EARNINGS_PROPORTION,'0'),'%') AS VOUCHER_EARNINGS_PROPORTION, CONCAT(IFNULL(CUMULATIVE_USAGE_VOUCHER,'0'),'%') AS CUMULATIVE_USAGE_VOUCHER, IFNULL(AVG_USE_MONEY,'0') AS AVG_USE_MONEY, IFNULL(LAST_INV_TIME,'') AS LAST_INV_TIME, IFNULL(LAST_RECHARGE_TIME,'') AS LAST_RECHARGE_TIME, IFNULL(AVG_NORMAL_MONEY,'0') AS AVG_NORMAL_MONEY, IFNULL(AVG_CHANGE_MONEY,'0') AS AVG_CHANGE_MONEY, IFNULL(AVG_INV_MONEY,'0') AS AVG_INV_MONEY, IFNULL(NORMAL_COU,'0') AS NORMAL_COU, IFNULL(CHANGE_COU,'0') AS CHANGE_COU, IFNULL(INV_COU,'0')AS INV_COU, IFNULL(VOUCHER_BALANCE,'0') AS VOUCHER_BALANCE, IFNULL(MARKETING_DAY,'0') AS MARKETING_DAY, IFNULL(LAST_LOGIN_TIME,'') AS LAST_LOGIN_TIME FROM TMP_LABELTAG_USER ;
